full_description:
Realme Buds Wireless 2S Neckband Earphone

The Realme Wireless 2S Bluetooth Headset lets you enjoy deep bass and engrossing audio when you listen to music or watch a movie. It has AI Environmental Noise Cancellation technology (AI ENC), allowing you to enjoy crystal-clear music and phone calls without being significantly distracted by background noise. Additionally, it has a built-in 11.2 mm dynamic bass driver that enables you enjoy deep bass and thunderous music. Additionally, the Bluetooth 5.3 technology offers a robust network signal and enhanced audio quality.

AI ENC Noise Cancellation Technology

The Realme Wireless 2S Bluetooth Headset's AI Environmental Noise Cancellation technology (AI ENC) effectively blocks out background noise for an immersive listening experience, enabling you to engage in free-flowing communication throughout the day.

Dynamic Bass Driver

The Realme Buds Wireless 2S Neckband delivers unequaled deep bass for immersing clarity in every beat and features a huge 11.2 mm dynamic bass driver.

Long-life Battery

Boasting a powerful battery, this headset offers you up to 7 hours of listening by charging it for 20 minutes. As a result, you can remain engrossed in music for a long-lasting time.

Dual Device Switching

Realme Buds Wireless 2S lets you seamlessly toggle between two devices without pairing and connecting repeatedly so that you can effortlessly enjoy movies to games, and calls to music and get theatre-like audio experience every time.

Seamless Bluetooth Connectivity

Thanks to the Bluetooth 5.3 technology, you can enjoy a high transmission speed to a distance up to 10 m, enhanced anti-jamming capability and stable signal while listening to music, playing games or streaming videos.

Magnetic Quick Connection

You can connect the Realme Buds Wireless 2S together to instantly disconnect it and pause audio playback whenever required, thus conserving battery life, thanks to their Magnetic Instant connection technology.

full_description:
Realme Buds Wireless 3 ANC Neckband

The Realme Buds Wireless 3 ANC Neckband is a smart audio accessory that combines design and utility perfectly. These wireless headphones give an immersive audio experience ideal for music fans, thanks to a strong 13.6mm Bass Boost driver. The earbuds have an outstanding 88ms ultra low latency, making them an excellent choice for gamers and audio fans who value accuracy. The Realme Buds Wireless 3 provides a peaceful listening experience by efficiently eliminating ambient noise with 30dB Active Noise Cancellation (ANC). These earbuds have an IP55 rating for water and dust protection, making them suitable for use in a variety of conditions. Notably, a short 10-minute charge gives an amazing 25 hours of playing duration with ANC disabled, emphasizing simplicity and extended usage. The Realme Buds Wireless 3 ANC Neckband is ideal for individuals looking for audio accessories that combine sophisticated technology, durability, and an attractive appearance.

13.6mm Dynamic Bass Driver

The Realme Buds Wireless 3 Neckband features a huge 13.6mm dynamic bass driver that produces cleaner highs and mids while hammering out deeper bass. At the same time, the N52 magnet considerably enhances sensitivity, resulting in tremendous sound production. Immerse yourself with music like never before.

360° Spatial Audio Effect

The Realme Buds Wireless 3 Neckband's self-developed spatial audio algorithms provide 360° immersive surround sound, adding additional layers and texture to your music and making it simpler than ever to get in the zone.

25hrs Playback time with 10mins of Fast charge

The Realme Buds Wireless 3 Neckband's combination of a large battery and an energy-efficient processor results in extremely lengthy playback duration. Fast charging is also available, with only 10 minutes of charge providing 25 hours of excellent music.

30dB Active Noise Cancellation

The Realme Buds Wireless 3 Neckband's newest dual-core active noise cancellation chipset can recognize human speech and muffle background noise by up to 30dB. Turn on Noise Cancellation Mode when commuting, in loud subways, or on lengthy journey days to bring silence to the world and immerse yourself in your music and entertainment.

Ultra-lightweight, Ultra Comfortable

This Neckband is both inside and out comfortable. The silicone earplugs have been engineered to fit the form of the ear cavity with three sizing choices (S, M, L), adjusting to variances in ear shapes based on the shape of the ear canal. No more pain or discomfort, even during lengthy listening sessions, and a tight fit for improved physical noise cancellation.

Dual-device Connection

realme Buds Wireless 3 enables dual-device connections for mobile phones, PCs, and tablets, allowing you to take phone calls while viewing a movie without having to switch devices and disturb your flow.

45ms Ultra-low Latency

The Realme Buds Wireless 3 Neckband Wireless 3 can achieve latency as low as 45ms, thanks to our newest binaural simultaneous transmission and new Bluetooth 5.3 technology, letting you to experience smoother gameplay and more seamless entertainment with dramatically reduced lag.

Real Quality with IP55 Water Resistance

realme Buds Wireless 3 has been rigorously tested to ensure sturdiness and longevity. Furthermore, with IP55 water and dust protection, you may use your earbuds with greater confidence.
